docs.snippet: Mexico's governmental human rights commission said Wednesday that excessive use of force by federal police resulted in six civilian deaths in a confrontation last January, including a person who was shot dead while lying wounded on the ground and ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico's governmental human rights commission said Wednesday that excessive use of force by federal police resulted in six civilian deaths in a confrontation last January, including a person who was shot dead while lying wounded on the ground and posing no threat.

headline.main: Mexico Rights Body: Police Used Excessive Force in 6 Deaths
headline.print_headline: Mexico Rights Body: Police Used Excessive Force in 6 Deaths

docs.snippet: On the campaign trail, among candidates of both parties, the idea of locking up drug criminals for life is a lot less popular than it was a generation ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: On the campaign trail, among candidates of both parties, the idea of locking up drug criminals for life is a lot less popular than it was a generation ago.

headline.main: Criminal Justice Issues Showing Up in 2016 Presidential Race
headline.print_headline: Criminal Justice Issues Showing Up in 2016 Presidential Race

docs.snippet: If terror remains as high in voters’ consciousness in 2016 as it is now, it is likely to pose a major problem for Democrats....
docs.lead_paragraph: If terror remains as high in voters’ consciousness in 2016 as it is now, it is likely to pose a major problem for Democrats.

docs.snippet: In a move raising the potential threat of a Russia-NATO conflict, Russia said Wednesday it will deploy long-range air defense missiles to its base in Syria and destroy any target that may threaten its warplanes following the downing of a Russian m...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a move raising the potential threat of a Russia-NATO conflict, Russia said Wednesday it will deploy long-range air defense missiles to its base in Syria and destroy any target that may threaten its warplanes following the downing of a Russian military jet by Turkey.

headline.main: Putin Sends Air-Defense Missiles to Syria to Deter Turkey
headline.print_headline: Putin Sends Air-Defense Missiles to Syria to Deter Turkey
